name: Artisan Adventure
description:
Works on iPhone 4 or higher!

Artisan Adventure is thrilling, innovative new Adventure/Role-Playing Game produced by an individual developer. Unlike the traditional adventure, here you are free to choose your adventures, featuring a non-linear storyline that will take challenge the Hero with tons of challenges. In the world of Artisan Adventure you are free to go train various skills or go slay the most powerful monsters that threaten the existence of your beloved town.

FEATURES

16 DIFFERENT SKILLS TO MASTER!

There are 16 different skills to train in Artisan Adventure, whether you want to become the more feared warrior or the most skilled craftsman is completely up to you, or you can excel at all fields and become a master in all available fields

SKILLS

- BATTLE
- DEFENSE
- AGILITY
- RANGING
- MAGIC
- ENCHANTING
- CRAFTING
- COOKING
- FISHING
- WOODCUTTING
- POACHING
- JEWELCRAFTING
- MINING
- SMITHING
- ALCHEMY
- MERCHANTING

OVER 1000 DIFFERENT EQUIPTABLE ITEMS

There are endless treasures to find on your Adventure, items change the appearance of your character in battle allowing you to customize your adventurer the way you like. Like most of the game, the way you acquire gear and rare artifacts is totally up to you, whether you craft the best items or plunder them from the most dangerous dungeons is based completely on your play style.

TONS OF ENEMIES TO CONQUER AND SLAY

The game features all types of different creatures; there are pesky bandits, corrupted soldiers, trolls, dragons, and much more. Some enemies are easy to find, while others will take you across the world and require you to search through countless dungeons and hidden locations.

UNIQUE AND CHANGING PLAY STYLE

Each of the skills are trained in their own ways, skills utilize the iPhones touch capabilities to simulate the skills you are training, you can swipe away at a tree with your ax or go fishing by strategically choosing where and when to cast your lure.


PLENTY OF ADVENTURES

The world of Artisan Adventure features over 50 different quests of all difficulties, secret locations and bosses for you to find and challenge, and many other discoveries that will take you on a journey through the deserts, mountains, forests, and swamps of Artisan Adventure.

FREE UPDATES!

-The best part about this game is there are many planned free updates to come that will keep your adventure going. Some of these updates include:

-2 More Skills (Engineering and Summoning)

-Online PvP Arena and Auction House (Nearly Complete)

-Expansion to the world beyond the two great seas

-More Quests, Battles, and Secrets for you to uncover!
